nrs_orr_object Struct Reference

Represents a backend-fs object or OST in the ORR and TRR policies respectively. More...

struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource oo_res

__u64 oo_round
 The round number against which requests are being scheduled for this object or OST.
__u64 oo_sequence
 The sequence number used for requests scheduled for this object or OST during the current round number.

 The key of the object or OST for which this structure instance is scheduling RPCs.
long oo_ref
__u16 oo_quantum
 Round Robin quantum; the maximum number of RPCs that are allowed to be scheduled for the object or OST in a single batch of each round.
__u16 oo_active
 # of pending requests for this object or OST, on all existing rounds

Detailed Description

Represents a backend-fs object or OST in the ORR and TRR policies respectively.
